first_para: Sir Edward Henry Garnier, QC, MP (born 26 October 1952) is a barrister and Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. A former Guardian lawyer, he is on the socially liberal wing of his party and has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Harborough in Leicestershire since 1992. He most recently served as Solicitor General for England and Wales from the election of 2010 until the 2012 ministerial reshuffle.

full.extract:
Sir Edward Henry Garnier, QC, MP (born 26 October 1952) is a barrister and Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. A former Guardian lawyer, he is on the socially liberal wing of his party and has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Harborough in Leicestershire since 1992. He most recently served as Solicitor General for England and Wales from the election of 2010 until the 2012 ministerial reshuffle.
^ "Edward Garnier, Conservative MP Harborough". BBC News. 22 October 2002. Retrieved 11 April 2010. 
^ "As it happened: Reshuffle". BBC News. 4 September 2012. 
^ www.bbc.co.uk
^ http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/politics/liberaldemocrats/9524105/Cameron-piles-Cabinet-with-record-32-ministers.html Cameron piles Cabinet with record 32 ministers, Daily Telegraph
full.title: Edward Garnier
